Date_Parser_1.label: Date Parser

NPS___Customer_Journ_4.label: NPS - Customer Journey - Promoters/Detractors/Passives

NPS___Customer_Journ_5.label: NPS - Customer Journey Delta KPI
NPS___Customer_Journ_5.query: q = load "${App.Datasets.SurveyQuestionResponsewithDetails_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; config = load "${App.Datasets.Journey_Survey_Question_Config_Metadata_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; config = filter config by 'Context' == "Customer NPS"; config = filter config by 'QuestionType' == "NPS"; config = filter config by {{column(NPS___Customer_Journ_1.selection,["Stage"]).asEquality("Stage")}}; q = filter q by 'Question_QuestionType' == "NPS"; q = filter q by {{column(NPS___Customer_Journ_1.selection, ["Stage"]).asEquality("JourneyConfig_Stage")}} && {{column(NPS___Customer_Journ_4.selection, ["Stage"]).asEquality("JourneyConfig_Stage")}} && {{column(Responses_by_stage_1.selection, ["Stage"]).asEquality("JourneyConfig_Stage")}}; q = filter q by 'CreatedDate_sec_epoch' >= {{coalesce(cell(Date_Parser_1.result,0,"Compare Min"),0).asObject()}}/1000; q = filter q by 'CreatedDate_sec_epoch' <= {{coalesce(cell(Date_Parser_1.result,0,"Compare Max"),0).asObject()}}/1000; promoters = filter q by 'NumberValue' > 8; detractors = filter q by 'NumberValue' < 7; journey = group config by ('Stage', 'SurveyID', 'SurveyVersionID', 'QuestionID') left, q by ('JourneyConfig_Stage', 'SurveyVersion_Survey_Id', 'SurveyVersionId', 'QuestionId') left,  promoters by ('JourneyConfig_Stage','SurveyVersion_Survey_Id', 'SurveyVersionId', 'QuestionId') left, detractors by ('JourneyConfig_Stage','SurveyVersion_Survey_Id', 'SurveyVersionId', 'QuestionId'); journey = foreach journey generate config.'Stage' as 'Stage', config.'SurveyID' as 'SurveyID', config.'SurveyVersionID' as 'SurveyVersionID', config.'QuestionID' as 'QuestionID', first(config.'SurveyName') as 'SurveyName', count(promoters) - count(detractors) as 'Value', count(q) as 'count', count(detractors) as 'Detractors'; journey = group journey by all; journey = foreach journey generate round((sum('Value')*100)/sum('count'),2) as 'Value', sum('count') as 'count', {{coalesce(cell(NPS___Customer_Journ_2.result, 0, "Value"),0).asObject()}} - round((sum('Value')*100)/sum('count'),2) as 'Delta', case when {{coalesce(cell(NPS___Customer_Journ_2.result, 0, "Value"),0).asObject()}} > round((sum('Value')*100)/sum('count'),2) then "rgb(0, 103, 20)" else "#B50E03" end as 'Colour';
